title: About Me
imageAlt: Profile picture of Huynh Van Thieu
description1: Hello! I'm Huynh Van Thieu, an Information Technology student. I am currently studying at university and continuously learning to become a skilled Full Stack Developer.
description2: During my studies, I have self-learned and practiced various technologies, from frontend like React, TypeScript to backend like Node.js, Python. I always look for opportunities to apply my knowledge to real-world projects.
description3: Besides coding, I am also interested in UI/UX design and strive to create products with great user experience. My goal is to become a Full Stack Developer capable of working efficiently from frontend to backend.
highlight1: Proactive in learning and exploring new technologies
highlight2: Experienced in project management, often taking the role of team leader
highlight3: Adaptable to new environments and able to work under pressure

education.school: University of Information Technology - Vietnam National University, Ho Chi Minh City

experience.title: Node.js Developer Intern
experience.description: Improved Git skills through real-world projects, learned NestJS, and contributed to developing a web application using NestJS (Backend) and React (Frontend).
